description: Icinga2 with InfluxDB showing all configured services.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "hostalive" WHERE "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'rta' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "hostalive" WHERE "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'rta' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)

list.name: service
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES  WITH KEY = "service" where hostname =~ /^$hostname$/
list.tagsQuery: SHOW MEASUREMENTS where hostname =~ /^$hostname$/ and service =~ /^$service$/

title: icinga2-influxdb-host
